name: Stan Wheeler
text: Anthony was amazing! He did great, best pizza I've ever had! And nice hair too :)  My baby boy Roy loved it too!

name: Rebecca Kraft
text: Good healthy pizza.  Fast fired. All pizzas are 11". We ordered original crust, regular red sauce,  mozzarella cheese,  pepperoni and apple wood bacon.  It was light and tasty. Not really enough food for sharing.  Next time we'll order 2 …More

name: Melinda Adams
text: Last Friday on 10/17 I ordered 2 Pizzas, I was told it would be ready by 5PM, and would be carried out to the parking lot.  At 5:15 PM I had top walk into the store, still had to wait, and then they got my order wrong ?  It was odd due to …More

name: Bran J.
text: Never disappointed when visiting! Staff can stand to be a lil bit more friendly but never the less service is good.

name: Madhu Menon
text: Strongly recommend to try this out. Very good options available to customize. The taste is very good. One of the best tasting Pjzza's i have had. I would say simple, fresh & tasty. The price is little bit on the higher side compared to the …More

name: Mynxii
text: First time trying them, had two large pizzas, ordered through doordash. They did not have any flavor. Very disappointed..

name: Thomas Gazdick
text: The food was awesome as usual but they need to find another way to save money then turning up the ac its hard to enjoy the food when you sweating while your trying to eat

name: Christopher Strickland
text: Excellent as always. Friendly service, clean dining room and restrooms

name: Felecia B
text: Pizza made to order. It's like going to Subway. Customer service was exceptional. My daughter and I both enjoyed the visit.

name: Bryan Adams
text: Long wait time, when not busy, and incomplete order.

name: Amber Danielecki
text: Pizza is good. The staff is incredible. They were super friendly and efficient but the icing on the cake (or pizza)? The things they do when no one is watching. We witnessed an employee on break purchase dinner for a homeless couple with no …More

name: Jacob Kizer
text: My brother told me that this place chain was awesome. We tried to go on pie day but the line wrapped around the building, so we came back the next day. It was cool but we really seemed rushed to pick our toppings and it seemed like when we …More

name: Margie Ramos
text: The pizza is always great no matter the blaze you go. Great food. I gave it a three because we were the only ppl in the restaurant.  So why wasnt the line cleaned and stocked. Food was just all over the line things was almost empty.  It's just a bad look.

name: Zack Robinson
text: I got the simple pie. It is just cheese, sauce, sea salt and oregano. It was great. Corona season so no sit down but place looked clean.

name: Kayleigh White
text: DELICIOUS AS ALWAYS

name: Loveisme Love
text: I had an amazing experience first-time customer and they did an awesome job I would definitely recommend this to friends and family and business partners

name: Henry Buys Homes
text: We love this pizza joint as they make their pizzas with fresh ingredients right in front of you to custom build them how you want!

name: Susan Rosenbloom
text: I love their original crust and the employees are super friendly! Who doesn't like creating their own pizza masterpiece? I always get the "take two". I get the half pizza and salad. My salad creation is THAT good.

name: Nancy Hudson
text: Amazing! We built our own pizzas and they were the best we've ever had. Great atmosphere. Very enjoyable 👌

name: Kari Smith
text: Very fast, hot pizza, friendly service

name: Amber B
text: Really delicious food!! It was our first time visiting and weren't really sure how the process worked, thankfully Ziah was there! She was super polite and friendly and explained the entire process. Great service, great food, and good prices! 10/10

name: Jai Goldsmith
text: Really like this place. Love the concept of design your own pizza and watch them make it. It's awesome.

name: Cetera Bunche
text: They are coming out with a gluten free crust. I am excited. Just make sure you don't put too many toppings on your pizza. It's makes it heavy and can cause toppings to slide off. I'm a witness of that. Lol

name: Melody Phillips
text: First, but certainly not the last time at Blaze Pizza! This is the freshest, most awesome pizza ever! Baked and served in record time. Nicest staff with a clean restaurant. See you soon, Blaze!

name: Keenan Turnure
text: Really good made to order pizza. Fast fired, the pizza is ready in about 5 minutes. Highly recommend

name: nakesha butler
text: 8.99 for an 11inch pie with unlimited toppings

name: Mela Robinson
text: Fast friendly service. Crust and ingredients always fresh. A little skimpy on the chicken, a few more dices would have been, one of my slices had none. My overall experience was great and I will return.

name: Tuba Capps
text: Great vegan pizza. The regular pizza crust is vegan. You can 'top'  your pizza beautiful pizza and 'Yummy' too .☺

name: Quinn Favo
text: Fantastic pizza spot. Gluten free and a wide range of toppings to build your own pizza. They take all the precautions for celiac (new gloves, separate serving utensils, different section of the oven) and the gluten free crust tastes better than the regular. There was a bit of a wait but they gave me a free drink and salad.

name: nate
text:
Easily 5 stars
Staff is friendly, polite, direct, and considerate. Not sometimes but everytime. I will always choose here first ! Keep it up

name: Wandakay Phillips
text: Fresh ingredients, made to order.. Great tasting pizza.. A Must Try.

name: jason craft
text: Friendly and helpful staff. The food was a relatively quick wait, with a reasonable price and great taste.

name: Ben Nelson
text: Awesome Pizza. Would be 5 star but they added BBQ sauce to my pizza without me asking. But still Awesome. Worth the trip.

name: James Elson
text: Fast, friendly with a wide variety of toppings to choose from. Definitely would go back.

name: Kelsey
text: I just stumbled upon this delicious place- great selection of toppings, home-made dough, fair-priced, good atmosphere- outdoor seating available, and very quick...what more could you ask for?

name: Vicki Hathaway
text: Love blaze pizzas  build  your own...

name: R B
text: Good pizza... Nice service

name: Shane Sullivan
text: Very delicious pizza that is prepared, cooked, and served very quickly and at a very good price.

name: Teresa Sandberg
text: Fast, Fresh ingredients. You pick what goes on your pizza. Price of food was excellent. Staff was nice.

name: Zach Sowell
text: Fast friendly service. Pizza was decent. If you're on lunch and in a hurry you can probably make this place work. Would go back.

name: Scott Ihlenfeldt
text: The pizza was awesomely delicious.  The cauliflower crust was amazing!  The staff were very helpful and patient with our group of first timers.  We will be going back, soon!

name: Peaches Smith
text: Extremely friendly staff, fast services and great pizza that you create yourself (choose whatever you want on it at one low cost) at an amazing price!  They also have an out of this world lemonade, called Blood Orange Lemonade!!!

name: Clint Abner
text: Love their pizza and their prices. We always get the build your own pizza. There are a lots of options for vegans.

name: Alicia Taylor
text: Customer service was awesome.. my daughter is picky and they made her laugh and step out of her comfort zone to try new things. Service was quick and everyone was nice.

name: Nick Bodell
text: It's like Chipotle or Subway style but with pizza. It's pretty good and the price isn't too bad. If you tell them you are celebrating the anniversary of your mom and step dad they won't give you a free mountain dew. But you can't really blame them for that. No one even likes my step dad.

name: Emily Nelson
text: I have been meaning to post a review about my visit last week while visiting family in Jacksonville. I always go to the Blaze Pizza in Atlanta, but my experience was by far the BEST its been since coming across this franchise. What made it …More

name: James Rouse
text: I Love this place,  order your Pizza and put any ingredients you want on it, as much as you want then they cook in a oven with fire. All of this for about $9.00. Blaze is the bomb.

name: Jill Crenshaw
text: My first time eating there and it was delicious!!  Great service!  Didn't have to wait long for our meal!

name: Jay Gardner
text: Great and fast service.  They have keto, cauliflower (non-keto), traditional and high rise crust! Varied topping choices and a seasonal veggie topping.

name: Zachery Aldridge
text: There ok can be slow at times

name: Barbara Kramer
text: Absolutely amazing. Great service and food.

name: Wendy Russell
text: Pretty interesting concept. The food was decent super quick and the staff was super nice and on top of their game. Plenty of food at a great price. Will definitely have again

name: cheri brown
text: The GF crust was very thin and crispy and delicious. The sauce was very tasty, ingredients very fresh and varied!. I was delighted that the staff asked if I wanted them to change gloves for mine and they did!

name: Claire Dalton
text: Some of them best customize your own pizza place around. The service is always wonderful.

name: Cyndi Harbour
text: 1st time there  and I ordered basic cheese pizza my husband and sons ordered custom pizzas everyone behind counter helpful and nice service quick  I feel you can judge pizza on basic cheese and it was hot , delicious and my family's pizzas were generously topped and delicious as well ...We will go back!

name: Mr. Smith
text: Their pizza is delicious and cooked fast and fresh! It is a "subway-like" concept where you get to see all the ingredients behind a glass and you pick everything you want them to put on it and then they throw it into a big pizza oven. It's done in less than 5 minutes! They have unique drink flavors too.

name: Jose Rivera
text: Great pizza and service

name: Heather Wysong
text: It was really good!  Love this place.  Crust was a little over done this time but still very good service and good pizza!

name: Dave Lott
text: Very nice, yet professional servers.  Pizza and salad heathy and delicious.  A fun place for nourishment!

name: Daniel Perez
text: Super good food and the employee are really nice and courteous 💪🏽💪🏽

name: Phoniex Life
text: It was my first time there and they were nice and had great customer service.  The pizza was delicious and they cooked it fast.  I will be going back.

name: lizzy b
text: Always good when we go and they let you pick whatever you want for your pizza and don't judge. So if you want 4 kinds of cheese do it!

name: adrian thomas
text: I've always enjoyed My experience every time My family and I have come. Thx for the good food, great environment & positive vibes in there. Keep up the amazing work! 💯

name: misito
text: Its clean and fast.  I liked their salads more than the pizza.

name: Scott Bryant
text: Love this place. Get to build your own pizza any way you want with no upcharge for extra toppings. Fast friendly service.

name: Jared Messer
text: Amazing people send service! Assume of the  best pizza in North Jacksonville by far!! A must try!

name: Shawn Smith
text: I've always enjoyed Blaze but I was so excited when I read that they have Keto pizza crust. It's not freshly made like the regular crusts but it tastes ok. I did love the crunch though!

name: James Wallace
text: It's pizza, exactly how you want it. Not enough cheese? Just add more. Not enough olive? Add more. Not enough high cholesterol? Add as much bacon and cheese and pesto drizzle as you want. You're in charge!

name: Stephanie Arke
text: Good pizza. Just pricey

name: Preston P Edwards
text: Cook a pizza in 3 minutes and it’s yummy. Fun little place to get a great pizza for a more than fair price. I highly suggest this place

name: Virginia Wilder
text: Always fun and delicious pizza...like I made it myself, only better!

name: Ziah Dawson
text: Great customer service! Great food! Always a good time

name: Toni Mullinax
text: The gluten free pizza was amazing. The cashier ask if I needed a glove change, I replied that I had Celiac Disease, she completely understood. The pizza came out hot ans delicious.

name: My Crazy Life
text: Good food and friendly staff.

name: Taya Ranee
text: Best pizza place I have ever came across! That are always nice and ready to serve you. They give u a warm welcome when you walk in the door. They have a very nice dining area and is not loud. The food is farm fresh. The sause is made fresh …More

name: Tia Andrews
text: I have visited both  the St. John and River City location. The River City location is awesome. Great pizza, very friendly staff and the environment was a lot more welcoming than St.Johns location. We usually go in a pretty decent size …More

name: christopher senger
text: The place has really made a come back.  The service was great and the store was a lot cleaner than the last time I visited

name: Kimberly Leonard
text: Unique pizza place. Staff asked if it was my first time there and walked me through ordering. Food was amazing! Couldn't ask for anything better. Can't wait until I go again.

name: Jamal Davis
text: Custom pizza taste great i enjoy the fire oven.  The establishment is clean and comfortable.  The only potential down side is the small selection of beverage.  Other than that.  Best quick fresh pizza.

name: Christopher Haley
text: First time eating there. Loved the experience! Making own pizza then cooked in flame, brick oven. Tasty! Very nice staff! Cozy little restaurant.

name: Diana Howard
text: I love this place I can have what I like on my pizza I don't eat pork anymore very seldom eat beef but they have a very wide selections of vegetables and I can get chicken

name: Troy Kearney
text: Super good single sized pizzas. Service is very quick. Variety of soft drinks and house made drinks that you won't find at other places.

text: I love this place. Food is good ,service is good. Nothing to complain about

name: Greenpastures Resort
text: Worst place ever....

name: Brandon
text: Loved the mango juice and soda. Should have never said yes when they asked if I wanted salt on my pizza. 🤮 Tasted terrible. But that was my fault. Would've been great without.

name: Justin L
text: Always good service and food.

name: Kristian Hogans
text: I have always loved Blaze Pizza! This is the perfect place to feast on a guilty pleasure. I forgot my debit card at home and after getting off late from work all I wanted was a pizza from Blaze Pizza. The manager at the Airport location in Jacksonville, FL was so nice; he comped my meal. I never stop visiting Blaze Pizza. Thank you.

name: Steve glasscock
text: Love the pizzas. Create your own. If it tastes awful it's on you.

name: Fiechia Crosby
text: Love the food 😍. Things are always fresh a wonderful treat to celebrate my birthday!

name: Bill Harris
text: Loved the build your own pizza. My wife tried the cauliflower gluten free dough, but she did not like it.

name: Antwan Marshall
text: Very clean, fast,good service, oh did I mention that the pizza is blazing. Good job Blaze Pizza.

name: Sherri Caldreon

name: Kushana Danglade
text: OMG they worked really fast they young lady that took my my order was very friendly some of the other workers could have been more friendly and had a smile on their face while serving me. The pizza was great

name: Calisha Belen
text: Love the build your own pizza  concept! Ordered a simple half pizza and knots, and it was delicious! Thin, flaky, and crispy crust makes me want to go on for more bites! Will definitely be going back!

name: Safaia Kitsune
text: Always a delightful experience. The pizza is always done just the way I like it and it's right next to a Cold Stone! A match made in heaven. I seriously can't go to one without going to the other anymore.😂

name: Luca Fox
text: It isn't the best pizza I've ever had, but it's very well prepared and reasonably priced and there are plenty sauce, protein, and veggie options to put on them.

name: Ana Cabral
text: Incredibly great great pizza. Everything on this well sized pizza, (made for 1 to fill one person & even share depending on how you load it), all is fresh & non-artficial & it is the best pizza I've had in a long time. I would love to find …More

name: Leanie Kite
text: Like Moe's. Only with pizza. Girl who took our order tonight was extra nice😻

name: SONYA Dunbar
text: Fast friendly  service and GREAT PIZZA

name: Mike C

name: Evelyn
text: Very nice I enjoyed the new cauliflower crust 😋

name: R. K.
text: They have a lot of pizza choices, we all got salads and were not disappointed.  Very good.

name: Courtney Stewart
text: I love the laid back atmosphere. The staff are super friendly and always willing to go the extra mile. The cost and the food are amazing!

name: Angel Monego
text: Great pizza build your own is they way to go and at a reasonable price.

name: Wynetta Ussery
text: Seriously build your favorite pizza. It's got to be good, you pick what you like.

name: Ryan Harris
text: Blaze has good prices and unique options. It is similar to Mod Pizza but offers more selection with salads, half pizzas, one-topping deals, etc. Delicious toppings and cheese should please everyone so you don't have to compromise on the pizza of your choice.

name: Kerri Foster
text: This is my favorite place in Jacksonville to get pizza. I like to get the high-rise, which is two of their dough crusts together, making a thicker crust pizza. There is great value in unlimited toppings, and the pizza itself is delicious. …More

name: Merry Sea
text: Excellent food, exceptional service! The food ingredients and preparation methods are first rate. Wait time was minimal.

name: marc j
text: Wow, super excellent!! Really great pizza, super fast, flavor reminds me of an old pizza place from my childhood that's long out of business. Friendly staff, great fresh ingredients, what more could you ask for? YUM

name: Ray Wollberg
text: The place was clean and well organized. The staff was friendly and efficient so we got through the line and got our food in short order. So having said all that why only a 3 star you might ask. It's like this I didn't care for their pies. …More

name: John Hall
text: Always great service along with great pizza!

name: Gabriel
text: Blaze Pizza is excellent you go in build your own pizza from scratch they keep it simple it's almost like a subway for pizza recommended the pizzas taste great you get your  pizza in about 10 minutes they also offer salads and different types of food it's quick assembly line clean and good food pay about 20 bucks for two people

name: Lewis H
text: Fast service at a decent price.

name: Yahya Azizpour
text: Great customer service and personalities.

name: John Barry
text: I really liked the pizza and the ability to pick the toppings, including sauce I wanted. They make it there for you to see and it goes into their oven immediately. As quickly as the pizza is cooked eliminates the wait. I do wish Blaze Pizza …More

name: Terry Diperna
text: A great pizza at a great price.  Make your own.  It only takes about 3 minutes in a fired oven to cook.

name: Robert Parker
text: Great place for a unique pizza experience.

name: Brittany Kestner
text: We always love Blaze for a quick and easy dinner. Everybody can get what they want and how they want! Super friendly staff, clean and family friendly. My husband loves the blood orange lemonade. They have been slowly adding unique menu items but everthing is always fresh and made to order.

name: LETS DO THIS! -Rose and Austin
text: Great pizza. Cooked in a brick fire oven.. You go down the line and tell they what all you want. They have several sauces and different cheeses and you can make them half and half so the kids get What they want on their pizza. And it's quick!

name: Louis Smith
text: Blaze is the AB-SO-LUTE BEST!!! They have every topping u can think of and it's made right in front of you. I'm vegan, so the fact that they have artichoke, spinach, basil, banana peppers -well, you get the point- along with vegan cheese …More

name: Melanie Tacy
text: We order our pizza to go & we were very disappointed when we tried it!  The bottom was burnt.  Our hands turned black from handling the crust, not impressed.   Wish I could post a picture!

name: Alison Trescarte
text: Great pizza, super quality. Not to heavy and the ingredients are one of the best quality I had so far in the US and tasted great. Price is really affordable and top of the cake the staff is making you feel welcome and is very friendly.

name: Mykell Fann
text: Great pizza

name: YaBoiCobb '
text: Top notch pizza. Super fast n super yummy. Deff will be going back

name: Tracey Bowens
text: Excellent! The veggies are fresh! The build my own pizza experience was amazing!

name: Lewis Williams
text: Great atmosphere and a great pizza. But my favorite is that s'mores!!!! Especially when they warm it up for you. The best!!!!

name: RENEGADE ART STUDIO LLC Richard Burton
text: You get to make your own pizza with all of the toppings you want at a great price

name: Janet Pamenes
text: Awesome staff!  Great service!  Paige made my gluten free pizza to perfection and and Levi helped me with my app.  I highly recommend this establishment.

name: Jung Lee
text: Not sure what all the hype is about.  Place was clean.  Staff was good.  Pizza was paper thin.  It filled me up while I was there but then was hungry after an hour.  Sorry - not as tasty as some people claim.  I was not impressed.

name: Boogie Blunt
text: Wonderful experience lots of ways to do your own pizza would recommend

name: Sara Daniels

text: Awesome. I love that you can get pizza they way you want it. Very reasonably priced and lots of options.

text: Good pizza and fast for a work lunch

name: Lucian Bailey
text: This was our first trip and it did not disappoint. Staff was friendly and helpful everyone look like they enjoy their job. Presentation of ingredients it was excellent everything look fresh. Pizza came out fast it was hot and delicious. …More

name: Christy Adam

name: Lizzie D'Souza

name: TC Q

text: My wife and I love Blaze pizza. Great selection of fresh toppings for your personal pizza.

text: Fresh ingredients, veggie and keto crusts, smores are great, and they have a few varieties of beer. I always stop here when I'm around the area!

name: David Bullard
text: Wow! Incredibly fast and good to boot.

text: The pizza was something to behold! The customer service was also great!!

text: Excellent I just wish they made bigger ones.just grad two then.mmmmm.mmmm

text: They are always so helpful with my allergy. They change their gloves willingly and are very kind.

name: adam eggert
text: $3.14 for a pizza on national Pi day. Pizzas are great and fast. I got the spicy one and it was just the right hottness. I'd go again.

name: Abigail Lambert
text: Love the pizzas here. Their workers are apparently not just well-trained, they are also undeniably well-mannered. They are really hard working and even a glance, you’ll never see them aimlessly chit-chatting in a corner or slackening off.

name: Christie Tamayo
text: Great pizzas, fast service and great customer service. BLAZE makes for a friendly family night out. We love this place.

name: Kevin thomas

name: CelticValor
text: Super good pizza and garlic knots loved it. Variety is great topping wise and many beverage choses!

name: Kendra Syphers
text: We come here quite often. Always good service, food done quick and always clean tables to choose from.

name: Danita Quintino

name: Daniel Dinkins
text: It was great! I found a new combination that I really like today. The make your own is the way to go try a variety it is wonderful.

name: Breeze M
text: The people who work here are pretty kind. I enjoy eating here. Plus they have good lemonade.

name: Ronda Patterson
text: Love the selection availanle to build your own pizzas

name: Ruby Mencer
text: Fresh toppings that I choose!

name: Donna Libert

name: Jacob Cave
text: It was fantastic pizza! Staff was really nice! Overall it was great!

name: Antony Bell
text: Awesome pizza. Great service!

name: Glenn Williams

name: Sydney Horkan

name: Cynoma
text: Good food and good service with fairly decent prices.

name: Gretchin Thompson
text: Sooooo muchhhhhh yaaaasssssss. This is the best pizza place  the staff are never talking to each other about non work related things. They go the extra mile for the customers. They are quick without being messy. Just amazing!

text: This is the place to go to eat if you are crunched for time or just want a bite to eat. There are so many toppings and combinations to choose from...there is even a gluten-free crust. Once your choice is made your pizza cooks and is ready within 3 to 4 minutes and is tasty.

text: I love the food and the workers are always nice, never rude here.

text: I ate a Blaze today, 7/2/2017 at 12:17 PM and David was my "Host".  What a positive and delightful young man!  Great personality!  He made my experience extra special with his upbeat, happy attitude!   Pizza was excellent as usual too.  =)   I will be back!

name: peter koskovich
text:
Great option if you healthy minded about what you eat.  Great salad a
